level.heading: D.C. SUPPLY SCHEDULE; GENERAL SERVICES ADMINISTRATION SCHEDULE (ยง 27-4724)

level.text: The Department may purchase goods and services but not construction or any other type of contract awarded on a cost reimbursement basis from the D.C. Supply Schedules or the General Services Administration (GSA) Schedule.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 58 DC 8805 (October 14, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 985, 1010 (February 10, 2012).
